Activity: Log in, check emails. Respond to any overnight communications.
Finalize draft of training module 2: 'Documenting Allergies and Contraindications to Influenza Vaccination'.
Combine Modules 1 & 2 into a single training presentation. Add visual aids (charts, graphs) to improve engagement.
Draft communication to staff announcing the upcoming training sessions. Include dates, times, location, and target audience.

Email @itpm-1 IT Project Manager: Request assistance with scheduling the training sessions in the shared calendar system and sending out notifications to staff. @pchmp-1 Physician Champion: Seeking their support and endorsement of the training program. Encouraging physician buy-in is essential for successful EHR adoption.
Lunch Break - Grab a sandwich and browse some ENFJ-related articles online.
Prepare training materials: Print handouts, ensure the training room is set up with necessary equipment (projector, screen, computer).
Review the process for referring questions about the vaccine to the ordering provider. Incorporate this information into the training materials.
Conduct a practice run of the training presentation to identify any areas for improvement.
Review practice run notes. Make final adjustments to the presentation.
Confirm training schedule with @itpm-1 and finalize the staff communication.
Wrap up for the day. Save all work and log out.
